GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the selected article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts the posting of a new comment associated with an existing article

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a single user object requested by username

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts an updated value for an article's votes property and serves the article once updated

POST /api/articles.description: accepts a new article and serves the article once posted

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: accepts an updated value for an comments's votes property and serves the comment once updated

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: accepts a comment id and deleted that comment
